Name: Trebuchet Installation Directory
Description: Folder for all the data needed by trebuchet. This will contains your mods, logs, saves, and most of your configurations.

Name: Conan Exile Installation Directory
Description: This is the path to your game. Leave it empty if you do not wish trebuchet to handle game launch.

Name: Server Instance Amount
Description: The amount of server instance to be handle by this trebuchet. Leave it at 0 if you do not wish trebuchet to handle server launch.

Name: Update Before Starting Servers
Description: Automatically update the server instances before starting them, including mods.

Name: Always Verify
Description: Verify the files after downloading them, either for server instances or mods.

Name: Max Simultaneous Downloads
Description: Max amount of files downloaded at the same time on the steam network.
